verses.verse: And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> a <S%H4522>tribute<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%>, and upon the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And all the <S%H4639>acts<s%> of his <S%H8633>power<s%> and of his <S%H1369>might<s%>, and the <S%H6575>declaration<s%> of the <S%H1420>greatness<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>, unto what the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1431>advanced<s%> <S%H3789>him<s%>, are they not written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia<s%>?

For <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> was <S%H4932>next<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, and <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, and <S%H7521>accepted<s%> of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, <S%H1875>seeking<s%> the <S%H2896>wealth<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to all his <S%H2233>seed<s%>.
